definition.name: Skeleton
definition.purpose: Display a placeholder UI while content is loading
definition.description: A reusable skeleton component that renders a pulsing, rounded rectangle to indicate loading state. It accepts all standard div props and allows custom styling via the className prop.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the skeleton

initial.data: No content, just a pulsing placeholder

visible: A rounded rectangle with a pulsing animation and accent background

when.description: The parent component is loading data

effects: Skeleton is replaced by the loaded content

definition.visualLayout: A div styled with rounded corners, accent background, and a pulsing animation. The size and shape are determined by the parent or passed props.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses a utility function 'cn' to combine class names. Accepts all div props for flexibility.
